articles.title: Ranking five American-born NBA players who could win MVP next: Anthony Edwards and future rookie lead the pack - CBS Sports
articles.description: Cade Cunningham, Jayson Tatum and Jalen Brunson round out the list
articles.content: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander won the NBA's Most Valuable Player this week and it marked the seventh consecutive year in which an international player has won the award. The last time an American-born play… [+8053 chars]
